message.content: {"features":[{"name":"User Authentication","description":"Allows users to log in and maintain sessions","userStory":"As a user, I want to log in so that I can access protected resources","category":"security","entryPoints":["src/lib/auth.ts"],"relatedFiles":["src/app/login/page.tsx","src/lib/session.ts"]},{"name":"Dashboard View","description":"Main application dashboard showing key metrics","userStory":"As a user, I want to see my dashboard so that I can get an overview of my data","category":"core","entryPoints":["src/app/page.tsx"],"relatedFiles":["src/components/MetricCard.tsx"]}]}
